text: Beat the Devil is a 1953 British American Italian adventure comedy movie directed by John Huston and was based on the 1951 novel of the same name by Claud Cockburn. It stars Humphrey Bogart, Jennifer Jones, Robert Morley, Peter Lorre, Ivor Barnard, Gina Lollobrigida, Edward Underdown, Bernard Lee and was distributed by United Artists. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1953 comedy movies Category:1953 adventure movies Category:British adventure movies Category:British comedy movies Category:American adventure movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Italian adventure movies Category:Italian comedy movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by John Huston
title: Beat the Devil (movie)
